movie.title: Chappaquiddick
movie.plot: Ted Kennedy's life and political career become derailed in the aftermath of a fatal car accident in 1969 that claims the life of a young campaign strategist, Mary Jo Kopechne.

events.title: Ted Kennedy crashes his car, killing his passenger Mary Jo Kopechne
after crashing his car, Ted Kennedy flees the scene
